analysis.summary: Jeffrey Epstein emails journalist Michael Wolff suggesting investigative angles regarding Donald Trump's Wharton classmates and Deutsche Bank documents, characterizing the bank papers as 'very bery bad' and questioning why these angles haven't been pursued.
